title: dhirana dhIm tanana (t)
sahitya:
dhirana dhIm tanana tatara tAni tanadhIm tajhaNutAm takiTataka
dhirana dhIm tanana tatara tAni tanadhIm tajhaNutAm takiTatakatAm
dhirana dhIm tanana tatara tAni tanadhIm tajhaNutAm takiTatAmta
dhirana dhIm tanana tatara tAni tanadhIm tajhaNutAm takiTatAmta tanana


anupallavi

  takiTajham tatarijham tari dhirana tillillAna tillillAna taritajham
tatari tataNa dhimi dhItlAm tajhaNutaka dhItlAm tajhaNutaka dhItlAm tajhaNutaka
					(khaNDam)
tadhimi taka tajjham taddhIm takundarita dhIttAm tajjham takajhaNuta dhittaLAngu
dhittAm takadhimita tajjham takundarita tajjham takundarita tajjham takundarita


caraNam    vinnapamu vinarAdA nA kanniyu nIvE gAdA kanaka mAlAlankrta vara kAmAkSi kAvavE
tom dhrudhru dhrudhru tOm tana tanadhiranA tajhaNu tAm takiTa tillillAnA dhirana
